Description
BottomLeftLShape
This class implements the ObjectiveStrategy and represents the strategy for the objective "BOTTOM_LEFT_L_SHAPE".
BottomRightLShape
This class implements the ObjectiveStrategy and represents the strategy for the objective "BOTTOM_RIGHT_L_SHAPE".
Card
The abstract class Card represents a generic card in the game
CardColorEnum
The enum represents the 5 different colors of a card in the game
CardSave
The class that represents the card status saving in case of disconnection
ChatCommand
The class represents the command that allows a player to send a message in the chat
ChatPacket
ChatPacket is a Packet that contains a message sent by a player to another player
ChooseColorCommand
The class represents the command that allows a player to choose a token color
ChooseColorController
JavaFX controller for the color choosing scene controller
ChooseColorPacket
ChooseColorPacket is a Packet that contains the color chosen by a player
ChooseObjectiveCommand
The class represents the command that allows a player to choose a personal Objective Card
ChooseObjectiveController
JavaFX controller for the objective choosing scene controller
ChooseObjectivePacket
ChooseObjectivePacket is a Packet that contains the objective card chosen by a player
ChooseStarterFaceCommand
The class represents the command that allows a player to choose the face of the StarterCard
ChooseStarterFaceController
JavaFX controller for the starter card face choosing scene controller
ChooseStarterFacePacket
ChooseStarterFacePacket is a Packet that contains the starter card face chosen by a player

The class that handles the chat packets from the server

The class that handles the token color choosing packets from the server

The class that handles the objective card choosing packets from the server

The class that handles the starter card face choosing packets from the server

Class representing the server-side state of a client connected to the server.

The class that handles the connection event packets from the server

The class that handles the game creation packets from the server

The class that handles the card drawing packets from the server

The class that handles the ending turn packets from the server

The class that handles the ending game packets from the server

The class that handles the starting game packets from the server

The class that handles the information packets from the server

The class that handles the joining client packets from the server

The class that handles the client login packets from the server

The main class of the client

The class of the client manager

ClientPacketHandler
The abstract class that represents the generic client packet handler
ClientPacketHandlerThread
 
ClientPeekDeckPacketHandler
 
ClientPingerThread
ClientPingerThread is the class that represents the thread that pings the clients to check if they are still connected

The class that handles the client pinging packets from the server

The class that handles the card placing packets from the server

The class that handles the game state restoring packets from the server
ClientStatusEnum
The enum represents all the possible states of a client in the game
ClientTurnCardPacketHandler
The class that handles the card face turning packets from the server
Command
The class represents the generic command a client can choose to execute
CommandReader
The class represents the command reader
ConnectionEventPacket
ConnectionEventPacket is a Packet that contains the information about a player's connection to the a game
Corner
The class Corner represents a corner of a card in the game
CornerCount
This class implements the GoldStrategy of the GoldCard that assigns points to a player based on the number of corners the placed card has covered
CornerLocationEnum
The enum represents the 4 locations of a card in which a corner can be found
CreateGameCommand
The class represents the command that creates a game
CreateGameController
JavaFX controller for the game creation scene controller
CreateGamePacket
ConnectionEventPacket is a Packet that contains the information about the creation of a new game
Deck
The class Deck represents the deck of cards in the game
DragContext
 
DrawCardCommand
The class represents the command that allows a player to draw a Card
DrawCardPacket
DrawCardPacket is a Packet that contains the information about the drawing of a card
EndGameController
JavaFX controller for the end game scene controller
EndTurnPacket
EndTurnPacket is a Packet that contains the information about the end of a player's turn
FaceEnum
The enum represents the type of faces of a card in the game
Game
The class represents a game.
GameController
The class that represents the game controller
GameEndedPacket
GameEndedPacket is a Packet that contains the information about the end of a game
GameGuiController
JavaFX controller for the game scene controller
GameInfo
This class represents the information of a game
GameSave
The class that represents the game status saving in case of disconnection
GameStartedPacket
GameStartedPacket is a Packet that contains the information about the start of a game
GameState
The class represents the current state of the game
GameStatusEnum
This enum represents the different statuses of a game
GoldCard
The class GoldCard represents a gold card in the game
GoldStrategy
This interface represents a strategy that assigns points to a player based on the type of GoldStrategy of the card that the player has placed on the board
GoldStrategyType
This enum represents the different types of GoldCard strategies from which a player can get points
GroundCardGestures
 
GUIClient
Graphical User Interface client view
HandCardGestures
 
HelpCommand
The class represents the command that prints the list of available commands and their description
InfoPacket
InfoPacket is a Packet that contains information during the game
JoinCommand
The class represents the command that allows a player to join an existing Game
JoinPacket
JoinPacket is a Packet that contains the information about the joining of a player to a game
LobbyController
JavaFX controller for the lobby scene controller
LoginCommand
The class represents the command that logs a player in
LoginController
JavaFX controller for the login scene controller
LoginPacket
LoginPacket is a Packet that contains the information about the login of a player
Object
This class represents an object in the game
ObjectCount
This class represents the strategy that assigns points to a player based on the number of objects of a certain type the player already has on the board
ObjectiveCard
The class ObjectiveCard represents an objective card in the game
ObjectiveStrategy
This interface represents a strategy that assigns points to a player based on the objective type they have
ObjectiveType
This enum represents the type of objective that the player can have
ObjectStrategy
This class implements the ObjectiveStrategy and represents the strategy for the objective "OBJECT_XXX".
ObjectTypeEnum
This enum represents the 4 possible types of objects in the game
Packet
Abstract Packet class Packets are used to send messages between Server and Client
PeekDeckCommand
The class represents the command that allows a player to peek the card on top of Resource/Gold deck
PeekDeckPacket
PeekDeckPacket is a Packet that contains the ID of the top deck card
PingPacket
PingPacket is a Packet that contains a ping sent by the server to the client
PlaceCardCommand
The class represents the command that allows a player to place a Card
PlaceCardPacket
PlaceCardPacket is a Packet that contains the information about the placement of a card
PlainPoints
This class represents the strategy that assigns points to a player based on the number of points showed on the placed card itself
Player
This class represents a player in the game
PlayerController
The controller class of a player that handles the player's actions
PlayerSave
The class that represents the player status saving in case of disconnection
PlayerState
The class represents the state of a player
PlayerToken
This class represents a player's token
Printer
The class that represents the TUI printer
QuitCommand
The class represents the command that allows a player to quit from the current game
Resource
This class represents a resource in the game
ResourceCard
The class ResourceCard represents a resource card in the game
ResourcesCommand
The class represents the command that allows a player to view his Resources
ResourceStrategy
This class implements the ObjectiveStrategy and represents the strategy for the objective "RESOURCE_XXX".
ResourceTypeEnum
This enum represents the 5 possible types of resources in the game
RestoreGameStatePacket
Packet used to restore the game state of the client after a disconnection or a server crash.
RMIClient
RMIClient is the class that represents the client-side RMI network handler

RMIClientConnection is the class that represents the client-side RMI connection

RMIClientInterface is the interface that represents the client-side RMI interface

Interface for the scene controllers
